name: Izmir: An Independence Simulator
description:
Dive into a post WW1 fiction where you lead the people for the independence of Izmir.

Our game combines the theme of world war 1 and the future, offering you a different tower defense gameplay.

Our game consists of 2 different parts.

Chapter 1 is where you play as tower defense.

The second part is the part where you progress by making some choices, that is, you actually rule a country at the same time.

The mysterious glass-hour inside the Izmir Watch Tower lets you use sci-fi tech. However, the more you use this glass-hour, the more likely your people drive crazy due to the chemicals released from the device.

Therefore you must seek balance using this glass-hour. These attributes are money, morale, allies, tech points. You should think twice before making any decisions in order to keep the balance.

If any of those attributes goes to *0* you lose.

Manipulate People:
Spread gossip or even post a job offer with help of the bartender. Earn attributes by doing so

Different Lines of Vision:
Every character in the game thinks differently and your relationship with them changes with every choice you make. Hence you must consider your decisions wisely.

Game Progress:
After every level you proceed you take little steps towards vast possibilities of the interactive storyline.
